response.overview: The film tells the story of two girls who study at a university in Rabat, live together, and both have bad pasts. Aziza (Thuraya Al-Alawi), who lost her mother due to her father’s violence, and Samira (Magdoline Al-Idrissi), whose parentage is unknown. Since they do not have a family to support them, they decided to use their intelligence and exploit their attractiveness in order to lure men. However, new events penetrate their plans and enter their lives.
response.title: الفرح الصغير
